eventSummary:
An address poisoning attack resulted in the theft of $12.5 million worth of Ethereum (ETH). This type of attack typically targets users of digital asset custody services by tricking them into sending funds to a malicious address that closely resembles a familiar one.
Sources:
- https://www.reddit.com/r/Buttcoin/comments/1qseds7/125_million_of_eth_stolen_in_address_poisoning

Reports indicate a security incident involving Binance, where an exploit was allegedly carried out on the exchange's end. The breach is described as having occurred despite the development team's precautions, with details of the exploit reportedly shared on the platform's blog.
Sources:
- https://t.me/GRIFFINai
